1.Name: Finishing Move - Rock Crusher
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color>
Jumps towards the target and executes a downward strike, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> in an area. This skill is good at interrupting.

1.Name: Overpower All Odds
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there is at least 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Stun</color> character in your squad: <color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color> inflicts 18% more Daze to enemies whose Daze is above 50%.

2.Name: Overpower All Odds
2.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there is at least 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Stun</color> character in your squad: <color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color> inflicts 22.5% more Daze to enemies whose Daze is above 50%.
